actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a formula for allocating funds apportioned to the territories for the National Highway System among the territories.

summary.text: Revises the formula for allocating funds apportioned to specified U.S. territories for the National Highway System to specify each territory's share of apportioned funds.

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a formula for allocating funds apportioned to the territories for the National Highway System among the territories.
